name: 劉世芸
objective:
本課程分為兩部分：（1）英文文法觀念的溫故知新，並引導學生將正確的文法觀念運用在閱讀與寫作上，學生可加強基本句型練習、句子改正及句型修正。相關討論包括直述句、引述句、句型變化與修飾;（2）英語修辭法：聽講溝通的有效原理原則。課堂討論主題包括：指稱、一致、倒裝等修辭觀念。修習本課後，學生對出現在相同邏輯意義語境中， 利用不同表達方式以凸顯各種語意的方式與內涵，當有更進一步的體認。					  
Textbook:  Academic Writing
schedule:
w1: orientation (introducing the essence of grammer in writing a 
    good composition) 
w2: Types of sentences (compound, complex, combination of both)
w3: Identifying the types and troubleshooting
w4: Problems of sentences
w5: Choppy /run-on/ stringy / fragmentary sentences  
w6: Problem-solving in problematic sentences 
w7: Noun clause 
w8: (cont.)               plus: direct and indirect reported speech 
w9: midterm exam 
w10: Adverb clause
w11: Application of adverb clause 
w12: Adjective clause 
w13: Application of adjective clause 
w14: Participial construction 
w15: (cont.)              
w16: Diction 
w17: (cont.) 
w18: final exam
scorePolicy:
attendance / Q&A / tests: 40%
writing: 10%
assignments: 20%
final exam: 30%
